DOC.detailed_description: Objectives To investigate 24 h effect bimatoprost 0.01 % monotherapy intraocular pressure ( IOP ) ocular perfusion pressure ( OPP ) . Design Prospective , open-label experimental study . Setting Single tertiary ophthalmic clinic . Participants Sixteen patient diagnose primary open-angle glaucoma ( POAG ) ocular hypertension ( age , 49-77 year ) . Interventions Baseline data 24 h IOP untreated patient collect sleep laboratory . Measurements IOP take use pneumatonometer every 2 h sit supine body position 16 h diurnal/wake period supine position 8 h nocturnal/sleep period . After baseline measurement take , patient treat bimatoprost 0.01 % one time per day bedtime 4 week , 24 h IOP data collect laboratory condition . Primary outcome measure nocturnal IOP mean bimatoprost 0.01 % treatment compare baseline .
